mapper.insert: insert into InterviewResult(user_pk, username, image_score, image_score_list, voice_score, silent_interval, graph_image_url, feedback, video_length, is_live, filename, test_date) values(#{user_pk},#{username}, #{image_score}, #{image_score_list}, #{voice_score}, #{silent_interval}, #{graph_image_url}, #{feedback}, #{video_length}, #{is_live}, #{filename}, now())
mapper.update: update InterviewResult set user_pk = #{user_pk}, username = #{username}, image_score = #{image_score}, image_score_list = #{image_score_list}, voice_score = #{voice_score}, silent_interval = #{silent_interval}, graph_image_url = #{graph_image_url}, feedback = #{feedback}, video_length = #{video_length}, is_live = #{is_live}, filename = #{filename}, test_date = now() where ir_id=#{ir_id}
